div.div: Ripon College vs. St. Norbert College
at De Pere, Wis. | Schneider Stadium

tr.td: St. Norbert wins toss and defers choice. Ripon receives south end.
Randy Hill kickoff 65 yards to the RC00, Kyle Novack return 16 yards to the RC16 (Craig Fagan).
Tom Sawyer rush for 19 yards to the RC35 (Matt Fargo; Joe Lorenz).
Eric Langman rush for 2 yards to the RC37 (Brian Feltz).
Connor Greenwal rush for no gain to the RC37 (Dan Savino).
Tom Sawyer pass complete to Eric Langman for 24 yards to the SNC39 (Joe Lorenz).
Eric Langman rush for 2 yards to the SNC37 (Brian Feltz).
Connor Greenwal rush for 6 yards to the SNC31 (Max Pirman).
Tom Sawyer rush for 2 yards to the SNC29 (Nick Keller).
Connor Greenwal rush for 1 yard to the SNC28 (Peter Latham).
